{{Actor| | type = Gore | name = Huge medical tank column | class = Tank2 | game = Strife | doomednum = 210 | convid = 32 }}[[Classes]]: Tank2
A column of three medical tanks filled with liquid, each containing a still-living human body. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Tank2 { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 192 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: TNK2 A 15 TNK2 B 11 TNK2 C 40 Loop } }
